SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.areas

Class GameArea

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.GameArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadWinAnimationScreen, CasinoGameArea, ElevatorGameArea, FlyingBossRoom, ForestGameArea, MainHall, MovingBossRoom, OfficeGameArea, Reception, ResearchGameArea, SecretRoomGameArea, SecurityGameArea, ServerGameArea, ShippingGameArea, StaticBossRoom, StorageGameArea, TunnelGameArea
public abstract class GameArea extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Represents an area in the game, such as a level, indoor area, etc. An area has a terrain and other entities to spawn on that terrain.

Support for enabling/disabling game areas could be added by making this a Component instead.

    A helper record to store the calculated boundaries of the camera's viewport.

    • registerDoors

      public void registerDoors(Entity[] doors)
      Adds room doors to the list. This method will lock doors, so it should be caleld upon room creating
      Parameters:
      doors - static array of door entities
      Requires:
      doors to have DoorComponent

    • unlockDoors

      public void unlockDoors()
      Unlocks the doors. Should be triggered when all the enemies are dead

    • getRoomNumber

      public int getRoomNumber()
      Returns the room number corresponding to the current floor.
      Returns:
      Room number as an int if the floor name is in the format "Floor2" with 2 being any number, otherwise returns 1.

    • spawnEnemies

      public void spawnEnemies(String roomName, int total, float scaleFactor, Entity player)
      Spawns the enemies based on the room number given.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the current floor/room.
      total - The total number of enemies to be spawned.
      scaleFactor - The scaling factor of the difficulty of the enemies to be spawned.
      player - The player Entity that is to be targeted by the enemies.

    • spawnRandomEnemies

      public void spawnRandomEnemies(String roomName, int total, float scaleFactor, Entity player)
      Spawns Random enemies based on the room number given.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the current floor/room.
      total - The total number of enemies to be spawned.
      scaleFactor - The scaling factor of the difficulty of the enemies to be spawned.
      player - The player Entity that is to be targeted by the enemies.

    • spawnOrRepositionPlayer

      protected Entity spawnOrRepositionPlayer(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 spawnPosition)
      Spawns or repositions the player entity. If a player already exists globally, it repositions them instead of creating a new one.
      Parameters:
      spawnPosition - The position to spawn/reposition the player
      Returns:
      The player entity (either existing or newly created)

      Parameters:
      leftDoorPos - grid position for the left/bottom decorative door
